text: Lost Horizon is a 1937 American fantasy adventure drama movie. Frank Capra directed the movie. It follows the story of the 1933 novel Lost Horizon by James Hilton. Ronald Coleman, Jane Wyatt, Edward Everett Horton, Isabel Jewell, John Howard, and Margo acted in the movie. Columbia Pictures. distributed it. It was nominated for 7 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1938 and was remade in 1973. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1937 drama movies Category:1930s fantasy movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:1930s American adventure movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Frank Capra
title: Lost Horizon (1937 movie)
